message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for a one-time opportunity. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950,000. This is a great deal, considering its true value to you is $1,000,000. I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else. What do you say? Are you ready to make a smart investment?
